snippet.title: Wyatt Derp 2
snippet.description: Wyatt Derp 2 is a brand new action game with a new look on the original with more influence from a top down view perspective for those who really enjoyed games like gunsmoke. You play Wyatt Derp a ruthless lawman out for justice! Journey through the wild west blasting through towns and shooting holes into every criminal around. Collect gold from the enemies you fill full of lead to purchase upgrades, shotgun shells, dynamite, and more! Enjoy fast paced action in top down awesome western themed shootem up that will keep you playing for hours.
